name: THE TRIO #1 A REMINDER : Don’t take yourself too seriously
description:
During psychedelic trips, one can make encounters with spiritual beings telling us and encouraging us not to take ourselves too seriously. This is something that I experienced while I was journeying in the astral plane after taking a dose of magic mushrooms. 

When I created this piece, I felt what I feel when I am journeying, most of the time at a low dose. I felt this subtle communication with a being who I think manifested himself through my art to remind me not to take myself too seriously, which I was doing at that moment.

This was and is the message : ‘Don’t take yourself too seriously, don’t take your life too seriously’. He is laughing at us because this is what we do most of the time.
